title: Tuscan Cats Get Into Mischief
description: The Tuscan cats go on holiday in this second of the series of the talking, dancing cats. More mischievous exploits as the cats get mixed up with a tomcat from the farm who introduces the ladies to wine, music and more making merry than is good for them. Getting into mischief is very apt title for this book about the naughty cats and the mayhem they cause.
author: Laura Graham
